newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Argentine Central Bank places $49 mln in repos.
newsitem.headline: Argentine Central Bank places $49 mln in repos.

text.p: Argentina's Central Bank said Tuesday it placed $49 million in overnight repurchase agreements at 9.0 percent against government bonds.
In the interbank market, call money rose to 6.0 percent from 5.75 percent at Monday's close.
The U.S. dollar was flat at 0.99983 pesos.
